mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(userid) FROM customer WHERE userid = #{userid}
SELECT COUNT(email) FROM customer WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (userid, password, tel_no, name, email, address, detailaddress, gender, birthdate, status, insertdate, updatedate) VALUES (#{userid},#{password},#{tel},#{name},#{email},#{address},#{detailAddress},#{gender},#{birthdate},1,now(),now())
mapper.update: UPDATE customer SET password=#{password}, tel_no=#{tel}, name=#{name}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, detailaddress=#{detailAddress}, gender=#{gender}, birthdate=#{birthdate}, updatedate=now() WHERE userid=#{userid}
